description: This file defines a React component named AppShell that provides a responsive layout with a sidebar and top bar, utilizing Next.js routing and custom UI components. It also includes a NavLink subcomponent for navigation links with active state styling.

methods.name: NavLink
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a navigation link with active state styling based on the current pathname.

methods.name: AppShell
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the main layout with sidebar and content area, including navigation links and a header.
